attributes.action: Change law on children not giving consent to hugs/kisses and give them a voice
attributes.additional_details: I'd like this to be treated in the same way it would be in an adult
attributes.background: I'm looking at trying to get child consent taken more serious. I teach my children about their body and how they have the right to say NO to hugs/kisses ect. In adults if a person kisses someone after saying no it's sexaul harassment but in children its overlooked as unwanted affection.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We understand that you're concerned about children being able to say no to being hugged or kissed by adults, but we're not sure exactly what 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
